div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 22:53 pm CDT

div.span: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 2am, then a slight chance of showers between 2am and 3am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 37. South wind 5 to 10 mph becoming west after midnight. Chance of precipitation is 40%.
Sunny, with a high near 65. Breezy, with a northwest wind 10 to 15 mph increasing to 15 to 20 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 34. Breezy, with a north northwest wind 15 to 20 mph decreasing to 5 to 10 mph after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 25 mph.

h3.a: Six Students Inducted Into BHS National Honor Society

div.p: 6 new members of the Rodeo Chapter of the National Honor Society were inducted on Monday, April 6, 2020 by current members of the organization. This year's celebration included a front yard surprise presentation of certificate and pins to the new members. The new members are Jenna Schott, Carter Mann, Jaycie Stout, Zakia Dawe, Jymmie Jensen and Kierra Ostrom.

a.aria-label: Read more about Six Students Inducted Into BHS National Honor Society

h3.a: Burwell High School Teachers Partner with NSEA and News Channel Nebraska

div.p: Burwell Public Schools is proud of our outstanding teaching staff! We are excited that two of our teachers have partnered with NSEA and NCN to offer digital video lessons for students across the state and nation! Emily Heerten, BPS Art Teacher, and Megan Helberg, BPS English Teacher, are both featured on "Teacher TV!" Visit the website to find their lessons as well as many others. . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Burwell High School Teachers Partner with NSEA and News Channel Nebraska

h3.a: Nebraska Safety Center and Local Schools Cooperate to Offer Driver Education

div.p:
Update:
Currently, the Nebraska Safety Center is planning to hold summer driver’s education classes. We are looking into other options besides in-person classes but nothing has been finalized yet. Refunds will be available to students if they decide to cancel their enrollment, however, please allow 4-6 weeks for the refund to be processed and returned to them. The Nebraska DMV is still issuing first-time . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Nebraska Safety Center and Local Schools Cooperate to Offer Driver Education

div.p:
IMPORTANT UPDATE: Burwell Public Schools
2019-2020 School Facility Closing
Last night (4-1-2020) Governor Ricketts announced that all Nebraska Schools are to operate without students in their buildings through May 31st. The NSAA has cancelled all spring activities. The Burwell Public Schools will continue our remote learning process through May 19th. Seniors last day for remote learning will be May 7th. A Graduation . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Campus Closed Through May 31st

div.p:
Kindergarten Round Up 2020
I can't tell you how excited I am for you, as parents, and your student to join our school next year. I wish I could greet you in person, but that is not safe at this time. However, we will be mailing out packets to kindergarten parents and I have attached a video presentation of information that I would love for you to watch.
Please Click on Mr. Drake's . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Kindergarten Round Up 2020-2021

h3.a: Philip Simpson Awarded the Gary Scharf Helping Hand Award

div.p: Philip Simpson, Ag Education Instructor and FFA Advisor at Burwell Public Schools has been recognized for his outstanding contributions. Established in 2009, this award recognizes a Nebraska agriculture instructor/FFA advisor for what he/she has done in "helping others," specifically in the school and community, outside of agricultural education and FFA. The recipient of this award is one who exemplifies the commitment, . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Philip Simpson Awarded the Gary Scharf Helping Hand Award

h3.a: Using the Internet Safely While Studying at Home

div.p:
Burwell Public School’s WiFi and hardwired data network is CIPA compliant and thus blocks known sites associated with mature or violent content and security threats such as malware. It also attempts to block access to social media sites, non-educational YouTube videos, and other distractions from instruction.
Take-home Chromebooks are configured with the GoGuardian Security to provide similar . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Using the Internet Safely While Studying at Home
